Title: A Study of Generative Large Language Model for Healthcare
Abstract: the expansion of the 4th industrial revolution is making it easier to collect and analyze big data through cloud technology. in addition advances in semiconductor design and manufacturing technology are accelerating the development of artificial intelligence due to improvements in computer processing speed and performance. these developments in artificial intelligence technology are expected to be applied to the healthcare industry and create new value. recently chatgpt which has evolved one step further has emerged bringing about the development of a new technology called ‚äògenerative ai‚äô. research is being actively conducted on how ai can replace fields that were considered the exclusive domain of humans with specialized knowledge such as medicine and law. in this study we aim to take the opportunity to identify trends in the healthcare field of generative ai.
